contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|desire}} '''[[Desire]]''' is a sense of longing or hoping. It may also refer to: {{TOC right}} ==Concepts== * [[Philosophy of desire]] * [[Greed]], selfish pursuit of wealth, power, or possessions * [[Interpersonal attraction]] * [[Libido]], sexual desire according to Freud and psychoanalysis * [[Limerence]], an involuntary state of intense romantic desire * [[Lust]], intense craving for self gratification * [[Motivation]], a thought that leads to an action * [[Preference]], a concept in the social sciences, particularly economics * [[Taṇhā]], ''craving'' in Buddhist psychology * [[Want]], in economics ==Music== ===Albums=== * [[Desire (Bob Dylan album)|''Desire'' (Bob Dylan album)]] * [[Desire (Pharoahe Monch album)|''Desire'' (Pharoahe Monch album)]], or the title song * [[Desire (Tom Scott album)|''Desire'' (Tom Scott album)]], or the title song * [[Desire (Toyah album)|''Desire'' (Toyah album)]], or the title song * [[Desire (Tuxedomoon album)|''Desire'' (Tuxedomoon album)]], or the title song ===Songs=== * [[Desire (Andy Gibb song)|"Desire" (Andy Gibb song)]] * [[Desire (Claudette Pace song)|"Desire" (Claudette Pace song)]] * [[Desire (Darin song)|"Desire" (Darin song)]] * [[Desire (Do As Infinity song)|"Desire" (Do As Infinity song)]] * [[Desire (Geri Halliwell song)|"Desire" (Geri Halliwell song)]] * [[Desire (Luna Sea song)|"Desire" (Luna Sea song)]] * [[Desire (Ryan Adams song)|"Desire" (Ryan Adams song)]] * [[Desire (U2 song)|"Desire" (U2 song)]] * "Desire", by [[Akina Nakamori]] * "Desire", by En Vogue from ''[[Funky Divas]]'' * "Desire", by The Gaslight Anthem from [[Handwritten (album)|''Handwritten'']] * "Desire", by Holly Valance from ''[[State of Mind (Holly Valance album)|State of Mind]]'' * "Desire", by Ozzy Osbourne from ''[[No More Tears]]'' * "Desire", by Poets of the Fall from ''[[Carnival of Rust]]'' * "Desire", by Raheem DeVaughn from ''[[Love Behind the Melody]]'' * "Desire", by [[Roni Griffith]] * "Desire", by Suicide Commando from ''[[Construct-Destruct]]'' * "Desire", by Talk Talk from ''[[Spirit of Eden]]'' * "Desire", by Toad the Wet Sprocket from ''[[Coil (album)|Coil]]'' * "Desire", by [[Vassy (singer)|Vassy]] * "Desire", by Yanni from ''[[Dare to Dream (Yanni album)|Dare to Dream]]'' * "Desire", by Yello from ''[[Stella (album)|Stella]]'' ===Performers=== * [[Desire (band)]], an American/Canadian electronic act * [[Désiré (baritone)]] (1823–1873), French baritone ==Film and television== * [[Desire (1920 film)|''Desire'' (1920 film)]], a [[British films of the 1920s|British film of the 1920s]] directed by George Edwardes-Hall * [[Desire (1921 film)|''Desire'' (1921 film)]], a German film directed by F.W. Murnau * [[Desire (1936 film)|''Desire'' (1936 film)]], a film starring Marlene Dietrich and Gary Cooper * [[Desire (1958 film)|''Desire'' (1958 film)]], a Czech film directed by Vojtěch Jasný * [[Desire (1968 film)|''Desire'' (1968 film)]], a South Korean film featuring [[Kim Ji-mee]] * [[Desire (1974 film)|''Desire'' (1974 film)]], a Hong Kong film starring [[Tony Liu]] * [[Desire (1982 film)|''Desire'' (1982 film)]], a Filipino-American film directed by Eddie Romero * [[Desire (1993 film)|''Desire'' (1993 film)]], an American film starring [[Kate Hodge]] * [[Desire (2000 film)|''Desire'' (2000 film)]], a film featuring [[Martin Donovan]] * [[Desires (film)|''Desires'' (film)]], a 1952 German film * ''[[The Desire]]'', upcoming Indo-Chinese film * [[Desire (TV series)|''Desire'' (TV series)]], an American telenovela * ''[[Desire Inc.]]'', a 1990 video documentary by Lynn Hershman * "Desire", an [[List of Grey's Anatomy episodes#ep57|episode of ''Grey's Anatomy'']] ==Comics== * [[Desire (DC Comics)]], a fictional character in ''The Sandman'' comic series * [[Desire (manga)]], a yaoi manga written by Maki Kazumi and illustrated by Yukine Honami ==Other uses== * [[Desire Street]], New Orleans, Louisiana ** [[Desire Area, New Orleans]] ** [[Desire Projects]] ** [[Desire (New Orleans streetcar line)]], an historic streetcar line running through the French Quarter in New Orleans to its namesake street * [[Desire (ship)|''Desire'' (ship)]], a ship sailed by 16th-century explorers Thomas Cavendish and John Davis * [[HTC Desire]], an Android-based phone by HTC * [[USS Desire (SP-786)|USS ''Desire'' (SP-786)]], a United States Navy patrol boat in commission from 1917 to 1919 * Desire, a line of LED luminaires produced by [[Electronic Theatre Controls]] ==See also== * [[Désiré]], a French male given name * [[Crave (disambiguation)]] * [[Greed (disambiguation)]] * [[Hunger (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}} [[es:Deseo]] [[fr:Désir (homonymie)]] [[ru:Желание]]
